exp.title: Teaching Assistant
exp.org: University of Utah, Kahlert School of Computing
exp.desc: Served as a Teaching Assistant for CS 3500 - Software Practice:
duties: Reviewed and evaluated 10+ student code submissions weekly, providing feedback on clean code principles and design patterns.
Evaluated 20+ code submissions weekly, providing feedback on clean code principles and design patterns.
Led weekly lab sessions and supported students during office hours and on Piazza.
Delivered efficient, rubric-aligned grading with minimal regrade requests.

exp.title: Website Developer
exp.desc: Managed and maintained web servers and created websites:
duties: Managed centralized LNMP servers supporting 20+ domains, including deployment, security hardening, performance tuning, and server migrations.
Diagnosed and resolved technical issues through self-directed learning, reducing average resolution time from hours to under 30 minutes.
